text: aap unase kah den ki tum hamaare baare mein jisakee prateeksha kar rahe ho, vah yahee hai ki hamen do[1] bhalaeeyon mein se ek mil jaaye aur ham tumhaare baare mein isakee prateeksha kar rahe hain ki allaah tumhen apane paas se yaatana deta hai ya hamaare haathon se. to tum prateeksha karo. ham bhee tumhaare saath prateeksha kar rahe hain
